meanings.sent1: The paddlers rowed their boat across the calm lake.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of paddlers enjoying the river on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The paddlers tried to paddle with their hands, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: In the race of life, we are all paddlers navigating our own paths.
meanings.sent5: The paddlers' synchronized movements on the water were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in paddling activities.
meanings.sent1: The paddlers in the kayak race were very skilled.
meanings.sent2: We joined a club for paddlers to explore different waterways.
meanings.sent3: The paddlers had a race to see who could paddle the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The team of paddlers worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The paddlers' enthusiasm for the sport was contagious.
